definition[0]: a dry substance in the form of very small grains
note[0]: milk/custard etc powder (=a powder that you add water to in order to change it into a liquid)
example[2]: Grind the sugar into a powder.
example[3]: The paint is supplied in powder form.
definition[1]: a type of powder that you put on your face in order to make it look smoother and to give it more colour
example[4]: Thereâ€™s a foot of powder on the slopes.
definition[4]: to put powder on something, especially your skin
